Package de.oth.blocklib.scheduling

Interface FrequencySchedulable

All Superinterfaces:
Schedulable
All Known Subinterfaces:
PrioritySchedulable
public interface FrequencySchedulable
extends Schedulable
An Interface to allow a task to be scheduled based on frequency and phase
Author:
Achim Bunke

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getFrequency()
    value must be greater or equal to 1 meaning the update should be called every {value} frame
    int getPhase()
    When the frequency is greater than 1 this should be used to prevent update cycles with greatly different numbers of tasks and execution time
    void setFrequency​(int frequency)
    Sets the frequency
    void setPhase​(int phase)
    Sets the phase

    Methods inherited from interface de.oth.blocklib.scheduling.Schedulable

    isActive, setActive, update

  • Method Details

    • getFrequency

      int getFrequency()
      value must be greater or equal to 1 meaning the update should be called every {value} frame
      Returns:
      The frequency on which the update method of this Schedulable should be called

    • setFrequency

      void setFrequency​(int frequency)
      Sets the frequency

    • getPhase

      int getPhase()
      When the frequency is greater than 1 this should be used to prevent update cycles with greatly different numbers of tasks and execution time
      Returns:
      The phase by which the updating should be shifted

    • setPhase

      void setPhase​(int phase)
      Sets the phase
